list-projects.name: E-Commerce Web Platform
list-projects.description: Renos.ID is an end-to-end online marketplace focused on home and living products, connecting manufacturers, service providers, and homeowners through AI-driven technology and industry-grade operational standards.
features: Developed and maintained a scalable e-commerce marketplace platform
Improved SEO performance to increase organic traffic and search visibility
Upgraded legacy architecture to a modern Next.js application
Implemented localization and multi-language support for broader market reach

list-projects.name: E-Commerce Mobile Platform
list-projects.description: Renos.ID is an end-to-end online marketplace focused on home and living products, connecting manufacturers, service providers, and homeowners through AI-driven technology and industry-grade operational standards.
features: Developed and maintained a scalable e-commerce marketplace platform
Improved SEO performance to increase organic traffic and search visibility
Upgraded legacy architecture to a modern Next.js application
Implemented localization and multi-language support for broader market reach

list-projects.name: Route Optimization & Tracking Platform
list-projects.description: A management platform for route optimization, real-time tracking, and SaaS
features: Developed management dynamic custom fields for route optimization and tracking interfaces
Built real-time features using Socket.IO and Integrated Firebase push notifications
Automated export features (PDF, Excel, CSV) for 5,000–20,000 daily records

list-projects.name: Doctor Appointment
list-projects.description: A mobile application for booking and managing doctor appointments with real-time notifications.
features: Built Android application using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
Integrated WhatsApp notification system
Developed backend services using NestJS

list-projects.name: Financial Services Platform
list-projects.description: BFI Finance is one of Indonesia’s oldest multifinance companies, publicly listed on the Indonesia Stock Exchange and operating nationwide financial services.
features: Developed frontend architecture using React.js
Built and integrated APIs using .NET Core
Implemented financial data validation and server-side pagination

list-projects.name: MeetBuddy
list-projects.description: An AI-powered meeting assistant application based on Large Language Models, currently under active development.
features: Designed LLM-based core features using Phi-4-mini model
Developed Python backend with real-time streaming support
Built Android client and REST API using NestJS

list-projects.name: Digital Library System
list-projects.description: A digital library and content management system for managing student book borrowing and academic resources.
features: Built CMS and user management system
Developed book borrowing and tracking features
Integrated analytics, email notifications, and reporting dashboards

list-projects.name: Education Platform
list-projects.description: MoleaWiz is a digital learning platform built on Moodle and used by CIMB Niaga to support structured online education and training programs.
features: Developed front-end interfaces for learning modules and dashboards
Built and maintained backend services using CodeIgniter
Designed and managed server-side architecture and database systems

list-projects.name: Digima Web Profile
list-projects.description: Digima Asia is a technology solutions company specializing in digital learning platforms and enterprise technology services.
features: Developed responsive company profile website
Implemented backend services using native PHP
Handled server configuration and database integration

list-projects.name: E Commerce UMKM Project
list-projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform for small business owners to sell their products online. Experience the convenience of online shopping with Ndenokum. Discover a new way to grow and sell your products online.
features: Modern UI built with React + Next.js for web
Native mobile functionality using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
User authentication and secure session handling
Real-time notifications and updates

list-projects.name: Movie Application
list-projects.description: A full-stack movie application for browsing, searching, and managing movie data.
features: Developed frontend using React and Redux
Built backend API using Express.js
Integrated external movie APIs for real-time data
